resources.string: This application requires the latest version of Google Play Services for AR.
This feature requires the latest version of Google Play Services for AR.
Installing Google Play Services for AR…

All data stored on Yeelight servers will be deleted (including room and scene data stored on servers in mainland China, the United States, Singapore, Frankfurt, Russia and India, which cannot be restored after deletion)
Cancel the Yeelight service will not affect other services and applications of the Xiaomi account
You can still login Yeelight app with xiaomi account
If you want to permanently cancel your xiaomi account, please go back to the upper-level page and choose cancel xiaomi account
The following changes will occur when you cancel the Yeelight service
Please make sure your network is under 2.4 GHz frequency band Wi-Fi and key in the correct password in order to add new device
Please select device to add. If it’s not on the list, please make sure it is reset correctly.
Choose the Wi-Fi name starts with \"yeelink-light\". Connect your phone with the device. Go back to Yeelight app after connect.

LAN Control enables your smart appliances to communicate with your Yeelight app or voice assistant using your local Wi-Fi network, instead of the Internet. LAN Control can make your existing smart home appliances respond faster. To setup LAN Control, click here.
The lights dimmed 30 minutes before bedtime, mimicking how the light changes at sunset and preparing the body for sleep.
Please press \"OFF\" and \"M\" button on the remote at the same time, click SCAN button after the indicator starts blinking
Check the network and try again
New device is requesting to connect. Please press the scene button on the top of the light to accept.
Please turn on your device and have your phone close by
Please turn on your device and have your phone close by
Make sure to connect to the power and enjoy the App
Switched to Asia and Oceania(Singapore) Server
Switched to North and South America(Oregon) Server

After the child lock is enabled, the brightness adjustment function on the base of the lamp can be locked to prevent children from using it for a long time at inappropriate brightness due to accidental touch.
*Brightness adjustment in APP is not affected

Devices to be added cannot be found?
If the device cannot be found, a possible cause is that the device is not reset properly. Please manually add the device by category.
If devices cannot be found, please check whether the following operations have been done.
If devices still cannot be found, please try the following solutions.

The device\'s signal is weak, which may cause unexpected issues, such as the device being inoperable or offline. Please keep your phone and the device close to each other.

The device\'s signal is weak, which may cause unexpected issues, such as the device being inoperable or offline. Please place the device close to the router orsomewhere with better reception of the Wi-Fi signal.

Use the power switch to turn the light on and off 5 times in a row (2 seconds on and 2 seconds off each time). The fan light will flash. After flashing for 5 seconds, the light will automatically restart, which means that it has been restored to the factory mode. When the fan lamp is used in a new network environment, you need to restore the factory settings, and then reconnect the network.

Use the power switch to turn the light on and off for 5 times (2 seconds on and 2 seconds off each time). When the light has a breathing effect, it has returned to the factory mode. When using in a new network environment, you need to restore the factory settings before reconnecting to the network.
Turn off the light after %1$d minute(s)
The device will be automatically turned off when timer ends.
Timer can only be set when the light is on

When Child Lock is activated, the function of sliding the touch bar on the lamp to adjustment the brightness shall be locked, avoiding the child to be exposed to unsuitable light due to touch by mistake.
Brightness adjustment in the App will not be affected.

\10------------------------------\10Need help with Yeelight?\10Send a message to our Support staff, Yeelight support engineer will get back to you ASAP.\10\10What’s in a great support request?\10Provide us with as much essential information as possible.\10Include any screenshots or video links that are related to your problem.\10
Please describe the issue to help us provide the best solution.
Network error, please check your network setting
Server error, please try again later
Your feedback helps us make Yeelight better.

How to connect the color light bulb to the Google Home App?

As official partner of Google Home, Yeelight works with the Google Assistant, providing your flawless smart lighting experience. Once you have setup your Yeelight device and your Google Home separately, you’re already to go.
Go to Google Home App to link

On the first day of Google I/O 2019, Google announced the Local Home SDK would be available for developers to improve the experience of using Google Home. This Local Execution method will deliver commands faster and more reliable to your smart home devices. As one of the first cooperators to support Google Home Local Execution, now Yeelight is ready to show \"Better\". Before you can experience the Local Execution, you need to turn on the device\'s LAN control.
Yeelight Smart LED Bulb M2 is a bulb that pairs to a Google Account and uses Google services to connect to the internet. Use the Google Home app for the seamless setup.

Power recycle your device, wait for about one minute and then pull down device list to refresh to check if it could come back online. \10\10If you still can\'t solve the problem, you can submit your error report to us, we will do our best to help.

As you did NOT select the recommended server, we can NOT provide proper service that is fully compliant with local law and regulations:\10\101. Your private data will be transferred to the server you have selected;\10\102. Your private data will be proceeded according to the law and regulation of the country or region where the server you have selected;\10\10Please make sure you are fully aware of the above risks before continuing.
I have noticed and will take the responsibility for the risks

To better protect the data privacy of ourusers, Yeelight is conducting a software update and as a result, has suspendedcertain features of our products in Europe, including Rooms, Scenes, Favorites,etc. The update will be completed in about a week and will not affect users whoare outside Europe.\10\10Yeelight is committed to protecting users’privacy and safeguarding data security. Yeelight strictly complies with locallaws and regulations on data privacy and makes the utmost efforts to protectthe security of our users’ data.\10\10We apologize for any inconveniences thesuspension of services may cause. Thank you for your support andunderstanding.\10\10Yeelight Team

Long press the power button for more than 5s. When the red indicator light blinks，the smart plug is reset successfully.
Device will be flashing to notify in order to help you manage your working and resting time.
1. We take a highly respectful and protective attitude towards each user\'s personal information and privacy, and hereby explain to you as follows:

2. When you use our services, we may collect the following types of information, including your personal information and device information; in order to provide you with the basic function to control your smart devices, we will collect and use necessary information; if you fail to provide the necessary information required for basic functions, we may not be able to provide you with our products or services.
3. Based on your express authorization, we may obtain information such as your location, and you have the right to refuse or cancel the authorization.
4. We will not disclose your personal information to third parties without your consent.
5. We respect your right to choose, you have the right to inquire, correct or delete your personal information, and we also provide you with account cancellation and complaint channels.

According to Singapore law, for your security purpose we suggest our user to store all the data in local server. We will migrate your current data (including room, favorite, personalized light, etc. excluding devices and groups) from U.S server to Singapore server. Or you can choose to delete these data.

If you do not agree with the privacy policy, we would not be able to provide service to you and will delete all the data (including the devices, rooms, favorites, scenes and customization), settings and logs related to your account on the server. The data deleted will not be able to restore.Are you sure to continue the current action?
I have read and fully understand
I have read, understand and agree to
I have read, understand and agree to Terms of Use and Privacy Policy
I have read and understand Privacy Policy
Yeelight service will be varied according to local privacy laws and regulations, please read our privacy policy carefully before you switch to another server.

We have updated our privacy policy, which requires you to read carefully and agree to continue to use Yeelight application. \10\10If you do not agree with the privacy policy, we would not be able to provide service to you and will delete all the data (including the devices, rooms, favorites, scenes and customization), settings and logs related to your account on the server. The deleted data will not be able to restore. \10\10If you have any question related to the privacy policy, you could contact us through the email of privacy@yeelight.com.

If you do not agree with the privacy policy, we would not be able to provide service to you and will delete all the data (including the devices, rooms, favorites, scenes and customization), settings and logs related to your account on the server. If you wish to continue to use the service, please read the privacy policy carefully and agree it to continue. \10\10If you have any question related to the privacy policy, you could contact us through the email of privacy@yeelight.com.
Shuoying DC inverter fan light S2001

Turn on LAN control. When the mobile phone and device are in the same local network, the device could respond to control commands more quickly, avoiding latency and abnormalities caused by external network.

Besides using Yeelight App, when Google Home device controls Yeelight device, the voice commands could be processed and executed through LAN. Local execution improves the response speed and connection reliability.
Are you sure to erase all the data and settings stored on the device?
Following options are used for setting up device initial state when it is turned on from the power source (e.g. light switch).

The state of the device will be automatically recovered from power outage. (If your device was preserved as OFF upon power resume, you can forcibly turn it on by ON and OFF your light switch twice in a row)
Press Save button, you can save current state as default, which will be applied when the device is turned on from the power source (e.g. light switch).
Press Save button, you can save current state as default, which will be applied when the device is turned on from the power source (e.g. light switch).
There is no linked remote controller!

After the power turned on, press and hold the switch key and the brightness adjustment slider for 5 seconds at the same time until the lamp display a Color Cycle effect. Then release the buttons, the lamp will be successfully reset to the original factory settings.

Simultaneously press the \"on/off\" and “Mode” button for 5 seconds, it will start flashing color. After 3 seconds, the bedside lamp will restart automatically and turn on white light, which means the ceiling light has been reset to default.

Reset the ceiling light by turning it on and off five times consecutively via the physical switch (turn on for two seconds and turn off for two seconds each time). After the droplight exhibits a pulsing pattern and returns to normal operation, it has been reset successfully.

Switch the ceiling light on and off five times in a row (2 seconds on and 2 seconds off), then the ceiling light will start breathing. After 5 seconds, it will restart automatically and turn on white light, which means the ceiling light has been reset to default.
Keep the power button pressed and plug in the power cable at the same time to reset the lamp.

Switch the bulb on and off five times in a row (2 seconds on and 2 seconds off), then the bulb will start flashing. After 5 seconds, it will restart and turn on blue light, which means the bulb has been reset to default.

Switch the bulb on and off five times in a row (2 seconds on and 2 seconds off), then the bulb will start flashing. After 5 seconds, it will restart and show white color, which means the bulb has been reset to default.

Directly press and hold the RESET button on the bottom panel with a pin for approximately 3 seconds, release the RESET button after the light start to flash. If you can see the light flash for 5 seconds and then restart automatically and turn on white light, that means the light has been reset successfully.
Simultaneously tap ON/OFF and Clock buttons on the touch panel for 5 seconds. Reset is completed when the light is breathing.

Plug and unplug the power adapter and turn on and off the light for 5 times continuously (turn on and off for 2 seconds each time), and the display hanging lamp will show breathing effect. After breathing for 5 seconds, the lamp will automatically restart, that is, the lamp has been restored to the factory settings.
Simultaneously tap the physical button and plug adaptor connector into the DC terminal on the lamp. Reset is completed when the light is breathing.
Simultaneously tap Light Sensor buttons and Clock buttons on the touch panel for 5 seconds. Reset is completed when the light is breathing.

Switch the bulb on and off five times in a row (2 seconds on and 2 seconds off), then the bulb will start flashing. After 5 seconds, it will restart and stay on, which means the bulb has been reset to default.

Directly press and hold the RESET button on the bottom panel with a pin for approximately 5 seconds, release the RESET button after the light start to flash. If you can see the light flash for 5 seconds and then restart automatically and turn on white light, that means the light has been reset successfully.

Directly press and hold the RESET button on the bottom panel with a pin for approximately 5 seconds, release the RESET button after the light start to flash. If you can see the light flash for 5 seconds and then go off, that means the light has been reset successfully.
The reset button is at the back of hub. When powered on, press the button for 5 seconds, and let go when the pilot light starts to breath in red. The Reset completes.

Switch the ceiling light on and off seven times in a row (2 seconds on and 2 seconds off), then the ceiling light will start breathing. After 5 seconds, it will restart automatically and turn on white light, which means the ceiling light has been reset to default.

Directly press and hold the RESET button on the bottom panel with a pin for approximately 5 seconds, release the RESET button after the light start to flash. If you can see the light flash for 5 seconds and then go off, that means the light has been reset successfully.

Turn the light on and off 5 consecutive times via the physical switch (the light must be left on for 2 seconds and then left off for 2 seconds each time). Release it as soon as the ceiling light begins to pulse and it will return to factory settings.

Unplug the power adapter, press the on/off button and meanwhile plug in the power adapter. Holding the button for 5 more seconds until the strip begins to show red, green, blue in turn. Release the button and the LED indicator will turn yellow, which means reset successfully.
When the power is on, press and hold the power button of the controller for 5-10s. Then, the light board will display the red breathing state, and it enters the state of Reset.
Press and hold both Speaker Mute and Mic Mute buttons, until you hear voice prompt announcement to indicate reset complete.

Use the physical switch to continuously turn the light on and off 5 times (2 seconds each time, 2 seconds off). The white light version will have a white light cycle effect. After 5 seconds, the lightstrip will automatically restart and be white light, indicating that the lightstrip has been restored.

Switch the bulb on and off five times in a row (2 seconds on and 2 seconds off), then the bulb will start flashing color. After 5 seconds, it will restart and show white color, which means the bulb has been reset to default.

Method 1:Long press the button for more than 5s. When the red indicator flashes, the Smart Dual Control Module is reset successfully.\10Method 2:Turn one of connected devices on and off 5 consecutive times via the physical switch (ON 2s and OFF 2s each time). The Smart Dual Control Module is reset successfully when the red indicator flashes and both devices are off and on automatically.

According to law, your withdrawal of consent could result in certain legal consequence, we will delete all of your data (including room, favorite, scene, personalized light, etc.) permanently. All the deleted data will not be able to be recovered. Are you sure withdraw consent?

After the authorization is revoked, we will no longer collect your information, but retain the processing authority for the previously collected information. If you want to delete the previously collected information, you can choose to contact us through the methods described in the privacy policy.
When setting default schedule, you can long-press the Schedule button on the lamp stand for 2 seconds to activate this mode.

To protect your eyesight, turn on the light sensor and adjust the color temperature and brightness of the light according to the selected mode, depending on the sensitivity of adults and children to light.

When the human body induction mode is turned on, the human body induction switch of the lamp can be used to turn on/off the human sensory function. The white indicator light indicates that the human sensory function is turned on. After turning on, the sensor detects whether the person is near the lamp and automatically turns on/off the light.

1.Due to a large number of electromagnetic, temperature, biological characteristics and other interference factors in the environment where the lamp is located, the sensor will have a certain probability of false detection.
2.When people stay stationary near the desk lamp for a long time, the lamp will automatically turn off, and the lamp will automatically light up after the activity of human body is detected again.
Failed to retrieve data from Wake-up Light, Please try again
The brightness of the light will be gradually increasing 30 minutes before waking up to simulate a natural and gentle sunrise. It helps to prepare your body for wake up
